properties.name: Stale IAAS policy attachment to role
properties.description: The rule detects 'IaaS policies' attached to a role that has not used them during the past X days. It is recommended to remove unused policies from identities to reduce risk.
properties.query:
Authomize_v2_CL
| where ingestion_time() >= ago(30m)
| extend EventID = id_s, Policy = policy_name_s, Severity = severity_s,Description = description_s,Recommendation = recommendation_s,URL = url_s,Tactics = tactics_s
| where Policy has "Stale IAAS policy attachment to role"
| project  EventID, Policy, Severity, Description, Recommendation, URL, Category, Tactics

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Stale IAAS policy attachment to role. The rule detects 'IaaS policies' attached to a role that has not used them during the past X days.It is recommended to remove unused policies from identities to reduce risk.
alertDetailsOverride.alertnameFormat: Alert from Authomize - Stale IAAS policy attachment to role
